list.description:
You guys don't even wanna know how long it took to remove all the lines because I just find out the limit is 2700 for lines. I had to do longer lines and cut out A LOT of things. One more to go for Rainy, enjoy! Next week is finals week so Ima be inactive. Stay tuned yall! And don't worry, feet sights will continue for my gooners. Also,

"Nadia is love, Nadia is life"
-ItzRainyBoy 2025

#minimalism
A small redesign of the scope into minimalism, removed extra risks. I wanted to find just such a scope here, but alas, I didn't find it, so I made one

Всем привет и это перезалив. Сделал новый прицел (доработал), исходное изображение я не стану выкладывать, не скажу почему иначе его опять забанят. Просто не могу, если загляните в Discord то там возможно найдёте прицел который я ранее выкладывал именно по этому персонажу.

Hello! For all fans of WuWa (and just gooners) I've decided to create a sight of new character Chisa :3.

Altho the main reason is she is literally my Wife and I wanted to see her 24/7 so first I asked on Wladimir_Lenin discord server for someone to make it for me. And later I tried it myself, so here are both versions!

crs. to Grim_chocole on the Discord Server {chisa.blk}

mine sight is {ChisaMyWaif.blk}

Enjoy gooners
#wtdraw #chisa #wuwa #wuthering_waves #sight #anime #waifu

Chara + Sans

If you find any defects, please let me know and I'll fix them :3

#sans #chara #undertale #wtdraw

This is Gladiator Sight Not Mine
1. Download "CyanAndPurpleSight" Zip folder
2. Go into the War Thunder files and go into "UserSights" folder and if you don't have "all_tanks" folder than make one
3. Put the blk file into all_tanks folder
4. Go into War Thunder and select the Reticle and make a new preset than exit out of the game
5. Go back to War Thunder files and go to "UserSights" folder again but now go into "tank_sight_presets" folder
6. But the blk file in "tank_sights_presets" as well
7. Go back into War Thunder and select the preset and the Reticle should be Cyan and the Backli...
